content:
You're really getting the most out of your smart TV, aren't you? Streaming shows on Amazon Prime and music on Spotify can be a lot of fun, and a good router like the Asus RT-AC86U will definitely help improve your overall internet experience.

With the RT-AC86U, you can expect:

* **Faster streaming**: The router's tri-band Wi-Fi and MU-MIMO technology will ensure that your smart TV gets the necessary bandwidth to stream your favorite shows and music without buffering or lag.
* **Reduced latency**: The router's low latency and QoS features will help reduce the delay between when you request content and when it starts playing, making for a more seamless streaming experience.
* **Improved coverage**: The RT-AC86U has a strong signal that can reach farther and penetrate walls and floors more easily, ensuring that your smart TV and other devices stay connected even in different rooms.

To get the most out of your new router, make sure to:

* **Update your firmware regularly**: Regular firmware updates can improve the router's performance, fix bugs, and add new features.
* **Use the router's app**: The Asus Router app allows you to monitor and control your network, prioritize devices, and set up guest networks, all from your smartphone or tablet.
* **Configure your QoS settings**: Set up QoS to prioritize traffic for your smart TV and other critical devices, ensuring that they get the necessary bandwidth for smooth streaming.

By following these tips and using the Asus RT-AC86U, you'll be able to enjoy a faster, more reliable, and more enjoyable streaming experience on your smart TV and other devices.

If you have any more questions or need further assistance, feel free to ask!
